title: Games Health w/poll
body: Game Knowledge is close to worthless with this unhealthy gameplay .With the games current state the better mechanical players are winning more frequently. The smarter players with years of knowledge like myself are much less relevant. My friend says League is dying, I am now starting to agree. dying League is still the best game on the market sadly enough.

replies.body:
Keep in mind the boards are an echo chamber of disgruntled bronze 2 players, so the results will be nearly meaningless..

From an objective point of view, the game seems to be growing or stable with riot putting more work into higher-quality assets/lore/improvements. That is not what you get with a game that is in decline.
